title: FlexTail Component CLI Configuration
description: Configuration file for the FlexTail CLI utility, used to define component locations and import aliases for use in TypeScript/JavaScript projects.

aliases.description: Defines paths and aliases for installed components.

path.description: The path alias prefix used for importing components (e.g., '@/' or '~/'). This MUST correspond to a path mapping in your tsconfig/jsconfig.
path.errorMessage: Alias path must start with @, ~, or . (e.g., '@/lib/' or '~/').

components.description: The local file system path where components should be installed (e.g., 'src/components/ui'). This path is RELATIVE to the project root.
components.errorMessage: Component path must be a relative path and should not contain leading or trailing slashes (e.g., 'src/components/ui').
